Package cz.ziki.had.scenes

Class GameScene

java.lang.Object
cz.ziki.had.scenes.CommonGameScene
cz.ziki.had.scenes.GameScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scene
public class GameScene extends CommonGameScene implements Scene
Represents the game scene where gameplay takes place.

    • GameScene

      public GameScene(KeyL keyListener)
      Constructs a new GameScene with the specified key listener.

    • GameScene

      public GameScene(KeyL keyListener, Set<GameObject> gameObjects, Set<Food> foods, Set<Obstacle> obstacles)
      Constructs a GameScene with specified game objects, foods, and obstacles.
      Parameters:
      keyListener - the key listener for handling user input.
      gameObjects - the set of game objects in the scene.
      foods - the set of food objects in the scene.
      obstacles - the set of obstacle objects in the scene.
